description: Returns information about the Amazon Web Services account used for billing purposes and the billing plan for the space.

nested_items.name: subscriptionType
nested_items.description: The type of the billing plan for the space.

nested_items.name: awsAccountName
nested_items.description: The display name of the Amazon Web Services account used for billing for the space.

nested_items.name: pendingSubscriptionType
nested_items.description: The type of the billing plan that the space will be changed to at the start of the next billing cycle. This applies only to changes that reduce the functionality available for the space. Billing plan changes that increase functionality are applied immediately. For more information, see Pricing.

nested_items.name: pendingSubscriptionStartTime
nested_items.description: The day and time the pending change will be applied to the space, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339.
